definition: great scholar respected for learning and integrity
school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: My yoga guru is going to teach us about breathing today.
sentences.chinese: 我的瑜伽宗师教我们关于今天呼吸。

sentences.english: Maybe there’s a new maestro in town.
sentences.chinese: 或许，我们又将迎来一个新的一代宗师了。

sentences.english: "Tai Chi Master" and I've also learned a little myself.
sentences.chinese: 我看过《太极宗师》的电视剧，也自学了几手太极拳。

sentences.english: Chinese companies share the same procedure with kungfu masters who once are disciples in the Shaolin Temples (Buddhist monastery famous for it's kungfu monks).
sentences.chinese: 中国企业都有一个从少林小子到太极宗师的过程。

sentences.english: She inherited the mantle of Ma Hong Tai Chi, Tai Chi and become a great master.
sentences.chinese: 她继承了马虹太极拳之衣钵，而成为太极一代宗师。

sentences.english: Farmboy. Pilot. Rebel. Jedi. Grand Master. Father.
sentences.chinese: 农夫，起义军飞行员，绝地宗师，父亲。

sentences.english: Guan Zhong was the master of ancient Chinese city planning and construction.
sentences.chinese: 管仲堪称中国古代城市规划建设的一代宗师。

sentences.english: Become a Grand Master in two professions.
sentences.chinese: 成为两项专业技能的宗师。

sentences.english: Mr. Shi Guangyuan is a guru in landscape photography.
sentences.chinese: 石光源先生是一位风景摄影的宗师。

sentences.english: The grand master, Gong Yutian, intended to retire from Zhong Hua President of the knights.
sentences.chinese: 一代宗师，宫羽田打算辞退中华武士会会长职位。

sentences.english: Chinese enterprises have a kid from Shaolin to tai chi master process.
sentences.chinese: 中国企业都有一个从少林小子到太极宗师的过程。

sentences.english: Frank Lloyd Wright is a great master of modern architecture.
sentences.chinese: 赖特是现代建筑的一代宗师。

sentences.english: I did martial arts from a young age and studied Zen.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从一个年轻的宗师那学习武术。

sentences.english: Sen no Rikyu, a tea-master, wished to hang a flower basket on a column.
sentences.chinese: 茶道宗师千利休想把花篮挂到庭柱上。

sentences.english: You still meditate like our guru in India teach you ?
sentences.chinese: 你还会如印度宗师所教导的那样，去冥想吗？

definition: the Saint of War (i.e. the deified Guan Yu 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3])
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
Second Sage, traditional title of Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] in Confucian studies
handed down in a direct line from the founder
the present age/in office/the current office holder
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
elder/term of respect for a Buddhist monk
an eccentric/odd person/person of extraordinary talent
